amendment.description: Amendment to express a sense of Congress that recording Unique Device Identifiers at the point-of-care in electronic health record systems could significantly enhance the availability of medical device data for post-market surveillance purposes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 114-193 to express a sense of Congress that recording Unique Device Identifiers at the point-of-care in electronic health record systems could significantly enhance the availability of medical device data for post-market surveillance purposes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fitzpatrick amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fitzpatrick amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Fitzpatrick.
